extendedInfo.description: Can you identify the State flags? Test your knowledge of the State flags in Know Your State Flags. A great quiz game for all ages. Learn the State flags as you play. Keep Score on how well you know your flags.You can choose from 3 different game types: * Choose the correct State flag from 4 different pictures.* Choose the correct State flag clue from the picture.* Flashcards - View different pictures of flags to help you at identifying the state flags.The score is based on the number of questions, the percent answered correct, and the time it takes to complete the quiz.Keywords: Quiz, Test, Trivia, School, Learn, Learning, United States, USA, Scoreloop, Game, Flashcards, Flags,
